title: Donald Trump Contradicts His Own Golden Shower Germaphobe Defense In 2015 Interview As Howie Mandel Pisses All Over The Excuse!
text:
1/11/2017 7:37   Icky Icky Poo • Donald Trump • Howie Mandel • Sex • Disgusting! 
We really love calling Donald Trump on his bullsh*t. 
Earlier this week, a document leaked, alleging the racist Republican had hired prostitutes to perform golden showers in front of him. 
Related: Celebs Respond To #GoldenShowerGate! 
Well, Perezcious readers, if we rewind to August of last year, the businessman actually told   's Janice Min the exact OPPOSITE in a lengthy interview. 
During the chat, Janice straight-up asked the reality star about his rumored mysophobia, and wondered if his fear of germs would prevent him from shaking hands and kissing babies while campaigning. 
At the time, the famous father replied: 
" I'm not germophobic . I do it. … I go through and shake hands and do what I have to do, and people like me and I like them. In Iowa, I must have shaken 2,000 hands — and those were only the ones that were next to me." 
Well, there you have it. Either he was lying then, or he was lying now. 
And we aren't the only ones calling BS on his excuse! Hollywood germaphobe Howie Mandel pissed all over Drumpf's defensive argument, telling a TMZ paparazzo: 
"I don't know if that's a good excuse of why that didn't happen, because they say urine is very antibacterial. It's sterile. If you get something on you you're supposed to urinate on it. … It's urine, which is good for killing germs, and it's also a shower, which is important to every germaphobe. That's the golden rule." 
Nice zinger, Howie! LOLz!
